problems.title: Count Primes (Number Theory)
problems.description:
Given an integer n, return the number of prime numbers that are strictly less than n.

Input Format:
First line: integer n.

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the count of primes.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
10

Sample Output
4

Explanation: Primes less than 10 are 2, 3, 5, 7.
hintsList: Use Sieve of Eratosthenes for efficiency.
